Story 5-10.4: Add Intent Classification
description:
Integrate IntentClassifier into widget message processing for routing.

## Requirements
- Use IntentClassifier to classify messages
- Route to appropriate handlers based on intent
- Support: PRODUCT_SEARCH, CART_VIEW, CART_ADD, CHECKOUT, GREETING, ORDER_TRACKING

## Files to Modify
- backend/app/services/widget/widget_message_service.py

## Acceptance Criteria
1. Widget classifies user intent
2. Routes to product search for 'find shoes'
3. Routes to cart view for 'show my cart'
4. Falls back to LLM for unknown intents
close_reason: Pattern-based intent classification now extracts any product term dynamically (not hardcoded categories). Added fallback to featured products when search returns no results.

Story 5-10: Widget Full App Integration
description:
Integrate widget with all main app functionalities: personality system, e-commerce actions, intent classification.

Story File: _bmad-output/implementation-artifacts/stories/story-5-10-widget-full-app-integration.md

## Acceptance Criteria

### AC1: Personality System Integration
- Bot responds using merchant's personality type (friendly/professional/enthusiastic)
- Custom greeting is used when enabled
- Business hours are included in context

### AC2: Product Search API
- POST /api/v1/widget/search endpoint
- Integrates ProductSearchService with merchant's Shopify
- Handles 'no store connected' gracefully

### AC3: Cart & Checkout APIs
- GET/POST/DELETE /api/v1/widget/cart endpoints
- POST /api/v1/widget/checkout endpoint
- Cart persists across session

### AC4: Intent Classification
- IntentClassifier routes messages appropriately
- Falls back to LLM for unknown intents

## Sub-Tasks
- shop-s3s: Integrate Personality System
- shop-lfg: Add Product Search API
- shop-hd3: Add Cart & Checkout APIs
- shop-avh: Add Intent Classification

Story 5-10.3: Add Cart & Checkout APIs
description:
Add widget API endpoints for cart management and checkout.

## Requirements
- GET /api/v1/widget/cart - View cart
- POST /api/v1/widget/cart/add - Add item
- DELETE /api/v1/widget/cart/item/:id - Remove item
- POST /api/v1/widget/checkout - Create checkout URL

## Files to Create/Modify
- backend/app/api/widget.py (new endpoints)
- backend/app/schemas/widget.py (schemas)
- frontend/src/widget/api/widgetClient.ts (client methods)

## Acceptance Criteria
1. Widget can add/remove cart items
2. Widget can initiate checkout
3. Cart persisted per session
4. Rate limited appropriately

Story 5-10.2: Add Product Search API
description:
Add widget API endpoint for product search via Shopify integration.

## Requirements
- New endpoint: POST /api/v1/widget/search
- Use ProductSearchService
- Return formatted product results
- Respect merchant's Shopify integration

## Files to Create/Modify
- backend/app/api/widget.py (new endpoint)
- backend/app/schemas/widget.py (request/response schemas)
- frontend/src/widget/api/widgetClient.ts (client method)

## Acceptance Criteria
1. Widget can search products by query
2. Results respect merchant's Shopify store
3. Rate limited appropriately
4. Handles 'no store connected' gracefully

Story 5-10.1: Integrate Personality System
description:
Refactor widget's _get_system_prompt() to use get_personality_system_prompt() from personality_prompts.py.

## Requirements
- Import and use get_personality_system_prompt()
- Pass merchant.personality type
- Pass merchant.custom_greeting
- Pass merchant.use_custom_greeting flag
- Pass merchant.business_hours

## Files to Modify
- backend/app/services/widget/widget_message_service.py

## Acceptance Criteria
1. Widget respects merchant's personality type (friendly/professional/enthusiastic)
2. Custom greeting is used when enabled
3. Business hours included in system prompt
4. Existing tests still pass
